Class CompositeFigure

extends java.lang.Object

    Class for group of objects. Realise pattern "Composite". Its a composite part.

    • Method Detail

      • shiftSizeXY

        public void shiftSizeXY(int ptsX,
               int ptsY)
        Description copied from interface: Graphic
        Shifts a figure on ptsX/ptsY points to the right/up if pts is more than 0, to the left/down, if ptsX/ptsy less than 0.
        Specified by:
        shiftSizeXY in interface Graphic
        Parameters:
        ptsX - defines on how many points to shift on X scale a figure and the direction of its shift
        ptsY - defines on how many points to shift on Y scale a figure and the direction of its shift

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize(double gain)
        Description copied from interface: Graphic
        Increases/reduces the figure sizes by the gain of percent.
        Specified by:
        changeSize in interface Graphic
        Parameters:
        gain - defines on how many percent to increase/reduce the figure sizes.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Prints positions of all selected/allocated figures. This method works, when you check figure position in your graphic redactor GUI.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Graphic

      • add

        public void add(Graphic graphic)
        Adds the figure to the composition. This method works, when a certain figure gets to area that you allocate.

      • remove

        public void remove(Graphic graphic)
        Remove the figure from the composition. This method works, when a certain figure leaves from area that you allocate.
